How many people are affected by Hashimoto thyroiditis ?,"Hashimoto thyroiditis affects 1 to 2 percent of people in the United States. It occurs more often in women than in men, which may be related to hormonal factors. The condition is the most common cause of thyroid underactivity (hypothyroidism) in the United States.",GHR,Hashimoto thyroiditis
